# Tender Notice: Elder Helper Services

## Reference Information

* **Title:** Elder Helper Services
* **Solicitation Number:** 21465-25-4745774, 21460-25-4745891
* **Publication Date:** May 22, 2024
* **Closing Date:** June 7, 2024 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 17, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

## Tender Description

This is a public notice indicating that the Correctional Service Canada (CSC) intends to award a contract for Elder Helper Services to a pre-identified supplier. The services will be provided to support Indigenous offenders in federal institutions. The objective is to provide cultural awareness and spiritual guidance to the offenders to encourage personal growth and healing.

## Requirements

* The Elder Helper must provide the following services:
	+ Assist Indigenous offenders to benefit from traditional healing and contemporary treatment interventions by supporting the work of the Elders and the interdisciplinary team.
	+ Conduct group discussions and teachings, with the Elder’s agreement.
	+ Provide counselling services to offenders as directed when the Elder is unavailable.
	+ Assist staff to prepare reports (verbal and written) and provide other technical support for case management and parole processes.
* The Elder Helper must have a minimum of two (2) years of cumulative experience and must have acquired this experience over the past 10 years before the date of the closing of this notice.

## Rationale for Pre-identified Supplier

There is a limited number of suppliers available to provide Elder Helper services to meet the reintegration needs of CSC Indigenous offenders. The pre-identified supplier meets all the essential requirements.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for the statement of capabilities include:
* The supplier must demonstrate that it meets the essential requirements.
* The supplier must have the knowledge and experience required to provide the services.
* The supplier must provide a resume and two (2) references who can confirm their work as an Elder Helper.

## Procurement Procedure

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in this notice may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date and time of this notice.
